content: Hi all, we need to capture the questions and answers for alcohol use of a patient. Whcih resource is best to use. Can anyone suggest me.

Hi Mounika,
I would first have a look at Observation resources, maybe a Questionnaire/QuestionnaireResponse depending on the questions

In the Netherlands, we have this information model for AlcoholUse: https://zibs.nl/wiki/AlcoholUse-v3.1(2017EN)
Mapped to an Observation resource, findable on Simplifier.net
Yes @Ardon Toonstra We want to use the Questionnaire resource for capturing questions and QuestionnaireResponse for capturing answers.

here is an example implementation using these questionnaires in FHIR. NOTE: The AUDIT form may be subject to copyright restrictions.

http://gettingstarte-cjfwz-env.us-west-2.elasticbeanstalk.com/
